1.0.name: wordpress/wordpress-cursors
1.0.description:
WordPress Cursors is a simple plugin that allows you to change the mouse cursor on your wordpress system. Choose from a handful of great animated and static mouse cursors.

This is a nostalgic plugin for all those who remember tinkering with mouse cursors and system themes, have fun!
